positions.title: Junior Web and JavaScript Developer
positions.description:
Ecquire is software that moves data from the places where work gets done (Gmail, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter etc.) to the places where data needs to be stored long term (SalesForce, HighRise, Google Docs, MailChimp)

Never think about menial tasks again. Effortlessly send data from the places where work gets done to the places where it needs to be stored. Receive contextual data from the cloud into your workflow, and automate entire steps in your day. Ecquire makes your data in the cloud work for you.

positions.title: Social Media Manager
positions.description: I schedule posts of curated content relating to Chicago, Chicago style eats or hot dogs. The posts are meant to increase brand awareness and follower engagement. Reply to followers through all social media platforms as an extension of customer service. Create graphics meant to convert online followers to in-store customers.

positions.title: Front Desk Support / Social Media Manager
positions.description:
Worked as a front desk receptionist and support for reception staff. Receptionist duties included providing customer service to spa clients, check in and check out clients into booking software and keeping accurate records for month end reports.

Front Desk Support duties focused on coordinating a smooth transition from booking clients on a paper based scheduler to a fully integrated cloud software. I handled entering all data and set up to maximize efficiency and accuracy of front desk staff. I also helped streamline front desk procedures so that training new staff would be easier. Other responsibilities are creating graphics for promotional services and updating our WordPress Website

As a Social Media Manager, I schedule posts of informational curated content and self promotional ads based on analytics results and social media trends. Some posts are boosted for increased post reach and to gain more followers or follower engagement. I help create a monthly newsletter to send clients about updates on services or upcoming promotional sales.
